description: A look at some of the many versions of the picked-on heroine’s signature look.
title: The Faces of ‘Carrie’
title_page: The Faces of ‘Carrie’ - The New York Times
text:
1976 Film
BEHIND THE DRESS Brian De Palma’s screen version is one of the few horror films to receive two Academy Award nominations for acting — for Sissy Spacek and Piper Laurie, who played her mother, Margaret — though neither won.
